title: Ripley's Believe It or Not! Eye-Popping Oddities
description: Ripley's Believe It or Not!'s Eye-Popping Oddities 2016 is Ripley’s all-new, incredible collection of the weirdest and wackiest facts and stories in the world. From strange traditions in far-off places to weird collections from the town next door, this compilation of eye-popping photos and incredible info may be unbelievable, but it’s all verified to be 100% true.
author: Ripley Entertainment Inc.
